abstract: This essay propose an analysis about how Warren Court became one of the most particular in American History by confronting Jim Crow law, especially by applying the Bill of Rights. In this essay, we propose an analysis of how complex the unwritten Constitution is. Cases like Brown vs. Board of Education will be analyzed from a different point of view to understand the methods of the Court.
title: BEYOND THE WRITTEN CONSTITUTION: A SHORT ANALYSIS OF WARREN COURT
subject: law
